Key.English: Define the item the player must have to be able to use Player Resupply i.e "LaserDesignator"
Key.Chinesesimp: 定义玩家必须能够使用玩家补给的道具即.例如“激光指示器”

Key.English: Restrict the player selection to items from own side or their own faction / whitelisted factions (defined below)
Key.Chinesesimp: 限制玩家选择己方或对方阵营/白名单阵营 (定义如下)

Key.English: Allow players to request supplies via Air Drop
Key.Chinesesimp: 允许玩家通过空投请求补给
允许直升机/垂直起落 补给

Key.English: Allow players to request supplies via Helicopter/VTOL
Key.Chinesesimp: 允许玩家通过直升机/垂直起降请求补给

Key.English: Allow players to request supplies via Convoy
Key.Chinesesimp: 允许玩家通过车队请求补给

Key.English: Excluded config classes (f.e. Box_IND_Ammo_F,B_Soldier_diver_base_F,B_MRAP_01_F,...)! Caution: case sensitive!
Key.Chinesesimp: 排除配置类 (f.e. Box_IND_Ammo_F,B_Soldier_diver_base_F,B_MRAP_01_F,...)! 注意: 区分大小写!

Key.English: Only these config classes will be used (Box_IND_Ammo_F,B_Soldier_diver_base_F,B_MRAP_01_F,...)! Caution: case sensitive!
Key.Chinesesimp: 只使用这些配置类 (Box_IND_Ammo_F,B_Soldier_diver_base_F,B_MRAP_01_F,...)! 注意: 区分大小写!

Key.English: If defined, only vehicles/groups from these factions (BLU_F,BLU_T_F...) can be delivered. If undefined, defaults to player faction. Caution: case sensitive!
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果已定义，则仅限来自这些阵营的车辆/团体(BLU_F,BLU_T_F...) 可以递送. 如果未定义，默认为玩家阵营.注意:区分大小写!
